name: PhantomJS for ARM
body:
# phantomjs-2.0.0-armv7
Compiled for armv7

# Dependencies

For Debian-based distros:

`sudo apt-get install flex bison gperf ruby perl libsqlite3-dev libfontconfig1-dev libicu-dev libfreetype6 libssl-dev libpng-dev libjpeg-dev python libX11-dev libxext-dev`

# Download

`wget https://github.com/dhamaniasad/phantomjs-2.0.0-armv7/raw/master/phantomjs`

`https://github.com/dhamaniasad/phantomjs-2.0.0-armv7/raw/master/phantomjs_jessie`
(Compiled for Debian Jessie)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
